html: Just…on a Rainy day. When u feel, u r Not the place of truth…when u feel sad…just remind urself, that this world is Tiny, as a matter of fact it’s way smaller than your tear. So don’t waste them… I think it’s that time of the day when I should go & write in my book...or not.
